tool_description: Latest currency exchange rates, update every second.
name: Live Exchange Rates
title: Live Exchange Rates

api_list.name: latest
api_list.description: Latest currency exchange rate of given currency pair
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thi-live-exchange-rates-v1.p.rapidapi.com/usdjpy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thi-live-exchange-rates-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://thi-live-exchange-rates-v1.p.rapidapi.com/{currency_pair}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thi-live-exchange-rates-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
